body.name: Set of 25 Note Cards & Envelopes Stationery Set with Personalized Name and Border - Custom Stationary Set for Men or Women in Choice of Colors - 25 Note Cards + 25 Envelopes
features: SET SIZE & PRICING The price shown is for a set of 25 note cards + 25 blank white envelopes. You may adjust the quantity in your Amazon cart to order multiple sets. You can upgrade to colored envelopes for an additional fee. Envelope printing is also available for an additional fee.

DESIGN Your note cards will be personalized with the font styling and letter capitalization that's shown in the product images. The note cards can be printed in a choice of 20 ink colors - see the color chart for options. The print on the stationery is flat, crisp and clear.
NOTE CARDS are FLAT A2 and measure 5.5" x 4.25". The cardstock is smooth bright white 110lb premium weight. We do not print any logos on our note cards.

ENVELOPES The base price shown is for White envelopes. You may upgrade to colored envelopes for an additional $5.00 - see color chart for options. Envelopes are made from premium weight papers and have a deep, pointed flap. Colored envelopes are 91lb, white envelopes are 80lb. Envelopes can be printed with a return address in a choice of colors for an additional fee.
PACKAGING & SHIPPING Note card sets are packaged in clear lidded boxes, ready for gift giving or storage. Our default shipping carrier is USPS.
body.description: This note card set with a personalized name and single line border makes a great stationery set for men or women with its clean and simple yet professional styling. This note card set contains 25 note cards + 25 envelopes. All the stationery is made to order so you can choose your ink and envelope colors to create a custom set.Read on for more product details and if you would like more information before ordering, please get in touch.
